jump_scares.spoiler: A chimpanzee makes a loud noise
Jim sets off a car alarm
An infected individual jumps through a window
An infected screams from somewhere below Jim and Selena
Jim wakes up in a nightmare
A crow starts cawing loudly
An infected jumps on the truck that Henry is trying to start
One of the soldiers turns around and sees an infected at the window, who then jumps through the window and attacks the soldier
An infected tries to break into the room where Jim and a soldier are
An infected breaks through the back window of the car and attacks Henry
A body falls down from the stairwell next to a group of people on the ground floor
Someone runs through the door space
One of the infected slams against the glass door from the other side
The little girl attacks the police officer
An infected lady jumps into the centre of the hallway
A hand bursts through some glass grabbing one of the men
The light on the camera turns on revealing an infected person
The attic door suddenly opens
The camera spins around in the attic where a boy’s face appears. [Video]
Ángela and Pablo try and sneak past an infected person however they make a noise and it turns around
Ángela screams as she is suddenly dragged away
Karen looks outside through a gap in the wall and is attacked by an infected
An infected breaks through a wall in front of Alice and the boy as they try to escape
A now infected man turns around and hisses at the remaining survivors
Don recalls how his wife died and there is an abrupt flashback to earlier scenes of chaos
There is another abrupt flashback to Alice screaming for help
Doyle sneaks up and scares Flynn
Doyle scares Flynn again
Andy has a nightmare about his mother
Tammy screams as she grabs a key from a skeleton
An infected jumps at a soldier
An infected soldier bursts through a door and slams into a glass wall in front of Tammy and Andy. [Video]
Infected Don hisses and jumps at the door in front of Andy
An infected jumps up at the car window
Tammy walks into something and screams
Scarlet suddenly sees infected Don through her rifle’s night vision lens
Infected Don comes into view behind Andy
The scene abruptly cuts to the infected running through the streets of Paris
Mirroring the final jump scare from the first film, Angela is pulled back into the darkness
After Martos turns around in the apartment hallway, an infected comes running at him
Martos, now an infected, lunges at the camera
Out of nowhere, an infected boy drops down from the ceiling and grabs Larra
The infected boy suddenly jumps onto the priest’s back
When Larra turns, an infected appears in the doorway
An infected girl appears at the end of the hallway
Ori accidentally fires a gun
Ori fires a second shot
An infected suddenly jumps out from the kitchen
Infected Martos lunges at the group
A hand shoots out of the water and grabs the SWAT chief
The creature appears and starts attacking Rosso
The creature suddenly appears behind the priest and attacks him
Angela shoots Rosso
The camera suddenly cuts to the scene from the beginning of the film of Angela being dragged into the darkness
An infected slams onto the window of the kitchen door
Another infected slams onto the kitchen door
An infected’s arm breaks through the window
A woman appears screaming for help
An infected guest suddenly lunges at Koldo from within the police car
An infected’s arm breaks through the door
An infected reaches through the window and kills one of the characters
An infected suddenly runs out in front of Clara
The Medeiros girl from the first two films appears in the TV screen’s reflection behind Koldo
SpongeJohn appears from the darkness
As the light flickers on, an infected appears behind the glass window
The same infected bursts through the window and attacks Natalie
An infected appears in the kitchen door window
An infected attacks Clara
An infected lunges out from a doorway
Guzman appears behind Angela
Edwin, now an infected, suddenly turns around and snarls
Anciana, as an infected, suddenly screams
An infected is revealed behind the door
An infected appears and attacks a soldier
A monkey appears and shrieks
The zombie suddenly gets up and growls at Anna
A bunch of zombies suddenly burst through the wall
After the end of a musical track, there is a sudden cut to Anna jumping out of a kiddie pool
A zombie lunges out from behind the christmas trees
After Chris closes the door there is a loud cut to Anna running through some plastic curtains
After the red ribbon flies across the screen a zombie santa appears behind it and jumps towards the camera
An emergency vehicle rushes past
A woman’s face appears through shelving
A woman grabs Chris from behind
A zombie man jumps into frame
The camera pans back to Jonathan. A zombie screams beside Him
A zombie grabs man from the shadows
As the man reaches into the water to touch the parasite, it jumps onto him
A parasite walks onto the security camera and shrieks
An enraged man comes out of the darkness
A dog barks
The boy on the swing suddenly turns around and lunges at the group
A man snarls behind Clay
Clay opens a door and a woman lunges at him
Kay’s head turns towards Andy to reveal her face is covered in congealed blood
There is a very slight jump scare as Andy shines his torch on a woman and a percussion sound effect plays
Patriot grabs Shelly’s pigtail and it comes right off to reveal a bloody patch on her scalp. A few seconds later Shelly turns around and lunges at Patriot
Shelly lunges at another student in the playground
A hand appears on the door of the nurses office
Wade bursts into the staff room, startling the other teachers
A group of infected students appear in front of the window behind Rebekkah
An infected student jumps up from the back seat to grab the policeman
Wade opens the staff room door and an infected student is standing right behind it
A teacher appears from around a corner
The lights suddenly cut out
There is some loud banging as the children attempt to break into the room where the teachers are hiding
Lucy grabs Clint around the ankle while he is crawling through the ventilation duct
An infected child puts his hand on the grate over the ventilation duct
The vending machine makes a noise, causing the nearby infected child to scream
An infected child reaches into the car and grabs Clint
Doug turns a torch on and his face suddenly appears on screen, scaring the others
Zakk surprises Brodie
Rikki suddenly opens his eyes and attacks Zakk and Brodie
Terry, who is now possessed, appears beside Brodie in the bathroom
A bloodied hand bursts through Abigail’s chest
The face of Abigail, who is now possessed, pops up in front of Zakk and Brodie
Uncle Albert, who is now possessed, suddenly appears behind Brodie
An axe head hits the wall just beside Brodie
Lionel’s mother appears behind the nurse
Lionel’s mother comes up behind Lionel as he turns on the lights
Hands break through the door and grab Lionel around his neck
A zombie suddenly rushes past the stranger as he’s scanning the area with his flashlight
A loud sound can be heard suddenly as Liv taps on a window from the inside the cabin
A zombie’s hand bursts through a window and grabs Liv
A loud sound can be heard as Vegard in looking at helmets that he has found in a cave
A zombie’s hand bursts through the snow and right next to Vegard’s head
A zombie partially appears in frame and is about to attack Vegard
A zombie suddenly appears (in an extreme close up)
A loud sound can be heard in the nearby woods as Liv pauses for a moment to see if someone is close
A sound can be heard as a mysterious stranger is behind Roy
As Sarah touches the calendar, zombie hands come out of the wall in front of her. [Video]
A chained up zombie lunges at Sarah from behind. [Video]
The zombie on the table breaks free of its shackles
As Sarah walks down a hallway to investigate a noise, two men burst out of a door in front of her
A zombie hand bursts out of the earth as Sarah picks up a shovel
A zombie grabs Sarah
A bat flies past John
A zombie grabs Steel as he waits for Bub
John startles Sarah
As Sarah enters the helicopter a zombie grabs her
Luis breaks through bathroom door
A lady runs up to Ana’s car and pleads for help
Someone opens the drivers side door of Ana’s car
Gunfire is directed at Ana and Kenneth
A zombie lunges at the glass door in front of Andre
A zombie jumps down onto Bart’s back
A zombified Luda suddenly sits up in bed and lunges at Andre
Steve looks up and sees a zombie
Zombified Steve makes a screeching noise
Another zombie jumps out from behind some rubble
The pantry is broken open as they reach for the handle
The guy is tackled by a zombie
Zombie Lisa jumps up
A stranger rushes at Alex with a knife
A dark figure rushes toward the screen behind Alex’s nana
Adam startles himself awake chasing Lucy in a library dream sequence
Henry notices Adam’s fingers moving as he and Liz dump the bodies
Pollidori backs away from Liz’s body and us startled by his wife in the hall
Adam punches through Pollidori’s car window

movies.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness

jump_scares.spoiler: America turns around and strange and Wong are standing behind her
America looks into a puddle and suddenly an eye pops out
Wanda sees a reflection of the Scarlet witch in the window
When Wong turns around a monster suddenly roars
A woman with a shield suddenly attacks Wanda coming out of the steam
A man approaches a dark hole and after a long focus on the hole Wanda suddenly pops out
As red smoke begins forming in the background there is 2 seconds of silence and then suddenly a demonic looking Wanda snaps a man’s neck
After a long focus on a door labeled “Blast door” Wanda suddenly pops out with red glowing eyes
Wanda suddenly pulls America backwards by magic force
When Christine approaches a seemingly dead evil strange his eye suddenly opens accompanied by a scare chord
After Christine opens Strange’s eye, an evil soul suddenly fly’s towards the screen
Strange’s 3rd eye suddenly opens while he screams
Loud gunfire can be heard coming from the bus in front
The soldier outside the bus is attacked by a zombie
The apparently dead soldier suddenly opens his eyes and attacks
A zombie breaks through the car window and attacks Emma
A creature leaps out at Patrick
While Patrick is lying in the snow, a creature stands over him and screeches
The chained up creature tries to attack Jack
Lu turns around and comes face to face with one of the creatures
A creature pops up at one of the boarded up windows
The creature suddenly snarls at Lu who is hiding behind some stairs
The creature jumps onto the table above Lu
The creatures start banging on the walls of the house
While the player left behind by the bus runs to catch up to it, he is suddenly tackled by the zombie from the side
Lorit suddenly punches the framed picture on the wall, causing the glass to shatter
The woman outside is suddenly slammed against the phone booth while the doctor is inside it
As Lorit and Cleo look out of a window, a woman suddenly jumps in through the glass
A sudden bang startles the group
While giving a speech, the coach is tackled from the side by a zombie
Diago is grabbed by the mouth and pulled into a room
A zombie jumps out of the back seat
A zombie arm smashes through the door and grabs Diago
Some viewers might be startled by a loud gunshot as Ann shoots a zombie
A zombie appears in front of Ann as she flees the house
A deer runs in front of Robert’s car
As Robert is about to shoot a deer, a lion suddenly pounces on it. [Video]
During a flashback, an infected person suddenly lunges at the car window while Robert and his wife are talking. [Video]
An infected rat lunges at the wall of its container
Robert shines his light on a group of infected people
An infected person lunges at Robert
The apparently unconscious infected person suddenly jumps up on the table
An infected person suddenly tackles Robert
Several of the infected burst into the lab
Wade opens a door and is attacked by a zombie
Maggie has some flash-backs to when she was attacked by zombies
Maggie has further flash-backs while she is sleeping
Maggie appears in the doorway while Wade is sleeping
There’s an abrupt scene of a few dead animals on the wall
While walking up the stairs, Barbara discovers a corpse
Two arms reach through holes in the barricade and grab Ben
The lights suddenly turn off
Helen reanimates and opens her eyes
Reggie’s coworker opens the door, followed by a cut to a zombified man attacking him
Reggie turns around to leave and the zombified man suddenly jumps up from behind some boxes
During the opening plane scene, immediately after a soldier vomits, heavy machine gun fire pierces the hull of the plane
After Boyce reaches dry land, he hears voices in the distance but is forced to duck when heavy gunfire rings out around him
Loud gunfire may startle some as one of the Americans is executed by Nazi soldiers
As the soldiers walk across a field on the way to the rendezvous point, a landmine explodes as one of the soldiers says “that way, you get a cut of the profits”
Boyce approaches a slightly ajar door to look at Chloe’s aunt. He hears a noise behind him and turns around, when he looks back a disfigured person is standing in front of the door
Chloe starts talking from behind Boyce
After the scientist and soldier leave, Boyce looks through the hole in the wall once more and this time a mutated person lunges towards the camera
As Boyce inspects the tar pit, something moves in the bag suspended above it
As Chase walks away from Wafner (who appears to be unconscious) saying “I think I’m gonna need…” he is suddenly tripped by Wafner
As Chloe talks to Paul in the tunnel, a mutated person reaches in and pulls her off screen
Ford turns around after setting the explosives and Wafner is standing directly in front of him
Wafner is suddenly shot after saying “I am a god, Corporal”
A zombie snatches away the plate that Morgan holds out
Several of the infected start attacking Morgan’s car
One of the apparently dead soldiers suddenly jumps up and bites a man
A silhouette passes by in the foreground
An infected person jumps out at Colonel Knox
One of the lab workers looks through a window in the door and an infected person suddenly appears right in front of her
A lady puts her hand on the window of Grant’s car
A zombie appears in the doorway behind Jeong
As Jeong raises his rifle to look through the scope, a group of zombies suddenly appears in the night vision
The zombie in the driver’s seat suddenly opens his eyes, accompanied by a loud noise
A car slams into the side of the truck
A grotesque looking hand comes through the roof of Abby’s car
A patient opens his mouth to reveal his diseased tongue
A zombie breaks into El Wray’s truck
Carlos stands up and Hague is suddenly standing right behind him
A zombie bites Carlos on the arm as he goes to give Tolo his ring back
A car explodes
While feeding his wife some soup, Earl briefly looks away and when he looks back his wife has transformed into a zombie. [Video]
A burning man bumps into Dakota’s car
A crow bar slams into Dakota’s car window
An apparently dead J.T. suddenly sits up and points his gun at Hague
There is a single gun shot as Dakota walks towards the house
Block grabs Dakota by the hair
Zombies break into the restaurant
A zombie runs out of some bushes
A dog runs through the hallway of the old ladies apartment as the rescue team approach her
Mrs. Espinoza lunges at the rescue team
One of the rescue team falls from a height and lands on the ground with a thud
A screaming lady runs into a wall in front of Angela
Mrs. Espinoza runs at the rescue team and is shot repeatedly
Blood suddenly appears on the other side of a glass window, a few seconds later an infected breaks through the glass
Briana bites her mother
Briana attacks Danny
Mrs. Espinoza appears suddenly
The CDC inspector breaks through the glass door and grabs Yuri
An infected runs into the lift
An attic door drops down beside Angela
Scott looks into the attic with the video camera, as the camera pans around the attic, an infected boy suddenly comes into view. [Video]
Angela crawls towards the camera but is suddenly dragged away. [Video]
Alice gets grabbed from behind the doorway
Dr. Blue jumps down at Rain while she is fixing the power
A body falls out from behind the door
Inside a liquid-containing tank, a body wakes up abruptly
A zombie slams against the window from the other side
Hands grab through some grating on the side of the tunnel
A silhouette walks past the screen
Mr. Darcy suddenly attacks Mr. Kingston
Annabelle turns around to reveal half her face is rotting
A zombie’s head is suddenly blown off
Jane kicks Elizabeth in the back
A zombie’s head is blown off
A man is suddenly pulled away from the door by a zombie
A zombie pulls Mr. Bingley off the staircase
A young boy lying motionless on the ground suddenly jumps up and attacks a man
A bloodied hand appears on a window
Alice starts to drink from a pond when a mutant suddenly jumps out of it and attacks her
A monster breaks out from underneath some rubble
The creature pierces the roof of the truck that Alice is driving
After colliding with Alice’s car, the creature suddenly roars at Alice
There is a loud noise as Alice bangs into a metallic object
Alice is startled by a printer kicking into life
The red queen says “behind you” and Alice turns around to see a mutant running at her
An armed man pops up as Alice approaches the Umbrella Corporation motorbike
A zombie runs at Chu
A zombie rushes at Alice as she enters Dr. Isaacs’ tank
Alice shoots a flaming zombie
One of the dogs suddenly attacks Christian
Claire yells out to Alice who turns around as a zombie attacks her
The lights start to switch back on
The blades of the fan start to spin as Claire and Abigail go through it
A man falls through a trap door
A mutant rushes past the screen
Razor drops down behind Alice
One of the chained up corpses suddenly lunges at Razor as he walks past it
The mutant attacks Razor
The mutant gets up and runs away
Alice walks into a chain
The mutant drops down from the ceiling
The apparently dead creature gets up and attacks once more
Doc puts his hand on Alice’s shoulder
There is a loud (although not unexpected) explosion
A zombie attacks Dr. Isaacs
Nelson startles Shaun as he is looking at the paper
Noel surprises Shaun
Shaun walks into Yvonne
Shaun and Ed turn around and see another zombie in the back yard
Pete’s hand reaches out from behind the shower curtain
Barbara bursts into the lounge startling Shaun
A zombie appears behind Phillip
Shaun looks back at Phillip who has now turned into a zombie
Shaun’s group runs into another group of survivors
Shaun and a zombie break through the fence
A zombie puts his hand on David’s shoulder
The zombies break the window that David is standing in front of
A zombified Ed leans down and attempts to eat Shaun’s arm
Some viewers might be startled at two stabbings at this point
Woman says “talk to me” and turns to see a man in front of her
Woman says “talk to me” again and a woman appears in front of her
Woman barks like a dog suddenly
Man says “I let you in” and head tilts backwards
Boy bites girl in the hand
Some viewers might be startled at man lunging at woman
Larry looks inside a window and sees a white-eyed woman
A telephone rings
A hand reaches out through a dissolving hole in a wall, and attacks Joe
The camera zooms in on Martha, and immediately after the camera switches over on a decomposing corpse, floating on the surface in some water
The camera switches over to the white-eyed woman
As Mary-Ann begins to scream, the Camera zooms in on her
Jill turns around and sees two corpses
Jill opens a door and runs into a one-eyed zombie
Jill opens her eyes and reveals that her eyes are now white
As Emily puts her hands on a painting, a bell suddenly stars ringing
when Emily takes her hands off the painting, she sees that her hands are bleeding
After entering room 36, Liza opens the bathroom door, and sees Schweick’s corpse nailed on the wall
Liza looks through a window, and the camera suddenly shifts and zooms in on the book of Eibon
As martin looks through a book, a unseen force knocks him off the ladder
Martha discovers a re-animated Joe in the bathtub, that attacks her
The camera shifts over on a piano, that suddenly starts playing
Emily ducks her head down, and a zombie is standing behind her
A Zombie appears in front of the screen
Emily is crawling as the camera movers upwards to reveal another zombie
Dickie (the dog) turns around, and brutally kills Emily
Liza is suddenly attacked by the re-animated hotel worker
A unseen force suddenly hits Liza and John with thunderstorm, and blood starts dripping down on them
A zombie smashes through the window, and attacks Liza
The glass in a door suddenly breaks, and Dr. Harris is impaled by the glass splinter
A zombie leaps up, and attacks Liza
John opens a door, and sees a zombie slowly walking towards him and Liza
Jill suddenly attack Liza
Nicholas grabs Deadra’s shoulder
An eye appears on the other side of the keyhole that Deadra is looking out from
David grabs Russell by the wrist
An apparently dead Bill suddenly jumps up and starts screaming in his cell. [Video]
Jim attacks David with a metallic instrument
Jim appears above David holding some sort of circular saw
A large number of military personnel apprehend David as he exits the shed
David is grabbed around the neck by one of the Crazies
The female Crazie drops to the ground to reveal the male Crazie standing behind her
Becca screams suddenly
The face of a Crazie comes in to view in the back window
A car is hit by a missile from a helicopter and explodes
A man is shot through the head without warning
Judy pears around a corner and sees a Crazie. [Video]
David grabs Judy from behind and puts his hand over her mouth. [Video]
David opens a truck door and a dead body falls out
A hand grabs David around the ankle
Judy startles David
The movie starts with a flashback to Senan in an infected state, the screen briefly goes black before we see a bloodied hand touch a man on the ground (accompanied by a sound effect)
The protesters begin to throw things at the bus, startling Senan
During a nightmare we see a boy walking down the street before being attacked by infected Senan
During another nightmare we see Seenan panting heavily before a quick cut to a bloodied man accompanied by a screaming sound effect
One of the resistant patients suddenly lunges at Dr. Lyons as she reaches out to touch her
Abbie goes outside to investigate a noise and is startled by Senan as he touches her on the shoulder
A man breaks down the door and attacks Senan
Several loud gunshots ring out
A man is tackled to the ground by Senan
A truck blows up
Dr. Lyons is suddenly attacked by one of the infected after she shares a moment with a cured patient
One of the infected runs at Abbie
The infected that Conor is standing beside is suddenly shot
The soldier who shot the infected man is herself tackled by another infected person
After Abbie shoots dead one of the infected, the soldier lying on the ground suddenly reaches out to grab her
An infected person runs at Abbie and her son
A hand knocks out the garbage bag
The woman suddenly takes the hand of Detective Muldoon
After the radio has tuned out, a girl is suddenly standing on the street
After the monster looks out of the bathtub Peter suddenly hits the window pane and frightens his wife
The monster suddenly jumps up from the edge of the bed. This happens with an extremely loud sound effect
Detective Muldoon is pushed into the sink from behind
Goodman’s colleague shoots himself off-screen. The sound is very startling
When Goodman’s colleague in the car turns around again, a screaming woman knocks on the car window. This is very startling
The camera pans to the left where suddenly a zombie stands in the light cone
Hands suddenly come out of the bathtub and reach for Peter
Peter turns around and suddenly the dead woman stands in front of him and screams at him
Suddenly the screaming ghost appears in the left corner of the cupboard
A screaming ghost appears over Faith. The sound effect is very sudden
A screaming ghost appears in the car behind Lorna
When Detective Muldoon turns off the light, a ghost appears before her
The ghost appears once again
The ghost suddenly opens the door
Just after the son runs into the dark corner of the room, the female ghost comes out of it shortly after and murmurs to Detective Muldoon
After it turns out that it is not Muldoon’s real son in her arms, the screaming spirit of a child suddenly appears in her arms

movies.title: The Girl with All the Gifts

jump_scares.spoiler: The sound of a door opening may startle some viewers
A child suddenly lunges at the Sergeant
An infected child attacks Kieran

movies.title: The Return of the Living Dead

jump_scares.spoiler: While a person is contacting the police on the phone, a zombie jumps through the window
There is a loud noise from the roof of the house
A brief flash of a man’s bloodied mouth closing in on the camera may startle some viewers
There is a loud thud as a bird flies into a wall
There is a very short flashback to the Japanese man coming towards the screen
There is a loud bang from a man’s truck as he reaches for his phone
A man bangs on the train window
A zombie appears at the window of a parked train
One of the burnt zombies lying on the ground twitches
A personal trainer zombie attacks the glass
Body parts fall from the fire escape and land on a dumpster
A pack of zombies, led by R, bust through the pharmacy lab doors
Zombie dad makes a run and lunges at Perry before being shot dead
The skeleton eaters jump and claw at the door as R and Julie escape
M runs over three skeleton eaters with a luggage cart
Julie’s dad pulls a gun on R
A dead body/zombie jumps on Julie
A zombie lunges at the camera
A zombie attacks a man in the toilet
A zombie bursts out of a toilet door and lunges at Columbus
A zombie appears in the back seat of the car that Columbus is driving
Columbus has a vision of a clown crawling under the toilet cubicle door
Columbus wakes up on the couch and turns around to see his neighbour has turned into a zombie. [Video
The zombie neighbour reaches for the door-handle
A mechanical figure pops out at Columbus in the haunted house attraction
A zombie attacks Columbus from behind. [Video
A police officer on a motorbike gets hit by a truck
There is a loud explosion. Several seconds later a zombie falls onto a car behind Gerry’s family
As Gerry looks down a stairwell, a zombie suddenly rushes at him. [Video
A zombie spurts into life beside a group of soldiers
A zombie runs into the gun of an armed woman
An air hostess opens a compartment in the plane and an infected man jumps out at her. [Video
As Gerry turns around, a zombie bangs on the window in front of him
A zombie runs at the man from the side of the room
Tallahassee suddenly slams the brakes, sending Madison flying forward
